assignedto_id.description: The ID of the user the test is assigned to

case_id.description: The ID of the related test case

run_id.description: The ID of the test run the test belongs to

status_id.description: The ID of the current status of the test, also see get_statuses

estimate.description: The estimate of the related test case, e.g. '30s' or '1m 45s'

estimate_forecast.description: The estimate forecast of the related test case, e.g. '30s' or '1m 45s'

id.description: The unique ID of the test

milestone_id.description: The ID of the milestone that is linked to the test case

priority_id.description: The ID of the priority that is linked to the test case

refs.description: A comma-separated list of references/requirements that are linked to the test case

title.description: The title of the related test case

type_id.description: The ID of the test case type that is linked to the test case

custom_automation_type.description: Automation Type. Default values: 0 - None, 1 - Ranorex
